page.title: 08RYEISH GREEN SCHOOL (PART 2)
page.content: MAJOR BUILDING PROJECTS FOR A SCIENCE BLOCK,CRAFTS BLOCK,HUMANTIES BLOCK, LIBRARY,SIXTH FORM CENTRE AND AN ADDITIONAL GYMNASIUM HAVE RECENTLY BEEN COMPLETED.THE SCHOOL PROVIDES THE FOLLOWING FACILITIES: GENERAL CLASSROOMS,ROOMS EQUIPPED FOR SPECIALIST MODERN LANGUAGE TEACHING,A SPECIALIST ROOM FOR REMEDIAL STUDIES, GEOGRAPHY ROOMS,LIBRARY,SIXTH FORM CENTRE,LECTURE THEATRE,STUDY ROOMS, RURAL STUDIES ROOM,MUSIC ROOM,SCIENCE LABORATORIES,HOME ECONOMICS ROOMS, NEEDLEWORK AND FABRIC CRAFT ROOMS, CERAMICS,AND ART ROOMS,WOODWORK ROOMS, METALWORK ROOMS,A TECHNICAL DRAWING ROOM,A DESIGN RESOURCES CENTRE,TWO GYMNASIUMS,WITH CHANGING ROOMS,DINING HALL,EXTENSIVE PLAYING FIELDS WITH TENNIS COURTS,GREENHOUSES AND GARDEN AREA,A YOUTH CLUB ROOM AND A SOCIAL AREA FOR OLDER PUPILS.
